hackathons.name: NeuraViaHacks
hackathons.description: Captured medical data to construct interactive software using AI/ML for health insights. Built a web/mobile/dashboard tool focusing on detection and personalized recommendations.

hackathons.name: Gen AI Chakra – Smart Cities Hackathon
hackathons.description: Developed a Generative AI solution addressing urban and sustainability challenges for Smart Cities. Submitted code repository, demo video, and README.

hackathons.name: Gemini 3 Hackathon
hackathons.description: Built an application using Google Gemini 3 API for AI-powered solutions. Submitted public demo, code repository, and demo video.
